name: Serious Salads: White Bean and Mint Salad with Lemon Vinaigrette
description: Amazing how a homemade vinaigrette and fresh herbs can breathe life into canned cannellini beans. Feel free to make this salad ahead of time; it gets better and better the longer it sits.
recipeIngredient: 3 15-ounce cans cannellini beans, rinsed and drained
3 tablespoons finely chopped shallots or red onions
1/2 cup extra virgin olive oil, best quality

recipeInstructions.text: Combine all ingredients in a medium bowl and mix well. Serve cold or room temperature.
